website_summaries.verdict: Elegant and minimalist option for cheeseboard that stays cool and could also be used for baking.
pros: Attractive grey, black, and white marble that is versatile to match any serving ware and could be left out as décor when not in use
Generous 12 by 16 inch size is able to host a variety of cheese
Can be refrigerated and will retain coolness
cons: Some boards are unevenly cut and don’t lay flat on the table
Edges are not always well-cut or sealed

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Literally a slab of granite countertop. I was expecting something thinner. Be prepared to leave it on your counter because it's so heavy that you won't want to move it. The underside isn't even sealed and the edges are poorly done with frequent imperfections. I guess for the price I shouldn't have expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Scd

customer_reviews.title: Will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid granite board with good rubber feet to keep it in place and from damaging your counter. It's heavy and a bit awkward to work with, but it holds the cold so pastries and such roll out nicely. It's a great place to temper chocolate as well. It's big enough to do a lot of different dough recipes, but is not big enough to roll out my cinnamon rolls on it. Good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Pronzini/Muller Supreme

customer_reviews.title: Natural Granite Stone Pastry Board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board with dark black with light traces of gray-white-silver which enhances beauty. The board is what I have been trying to find for awhile. Board is very heavy with rubber feet so it will not move when being used as a pastry board. The board has a extremely smooth surface of which I recommend not using as a cutting board for heavy food items. Have used for cutting light breads or cake using a plastic serrated cutting knife. The quality of this granite pierce is unsurpassed. The dimensions is exactly 12x16x5/8 inches. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roller King

customer_reviews.title: Don’t rely on Amazon to match natural materials
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these round marble serving/cutting boards. And while they are cleanable, sturdy and giftable, they DON’T match. While I’m sure Amazon will say “they are a natural material”, someone in quality control should be making at least SOME effort to try to get pieces like these to look somewhat similar if more than one is ordered. If we were selecting these from a brick and mortar store, we’d try to find ones that “matched”...or we wouldn’t buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Functional, Timeless
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly, well packaged in styrofoam. Physically perfect. Exactly as advertised. There are 3 very thin round felt feet on the bottom which guarantee your nice tabletops won't be scratched. The beauty & color of the natural carved stone is apparent (see photo), & makes an excellent staging for bar accessories- I plan to add a crystal flask on this as well. During a party it would make an excellent presentation spot. This is a timeless, classic piece that will never wear out & has countless uses. Fantastic price. So pleased I discovered this on Amazon & purchased!!
customer_reviews.author: PolarPro

customer_reviews.title: Deserves the right to be on the counter top.
customer_reviews.text: Okay this is beautiful. Really I'm excited to use it. I was unsure of the color I was choosing. I thought it would have been the green in the picture. This is what arrived. The weight feels great. There's no chips or cracks. The holder is made of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate measurements
customer_reviews.text: If you were using these as a cutting board they would be fine but I was using them as tops to small cabinets and the measurements in the description are wrong. The actual measurements of the 2 I purchased are 11.75 x 15.75 I have not been successful with the seller at resolution
customer_reviews.author: Avid amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Got exactly what it said it was
customer_reviews.text: Great board for dough and many other uses. It arrived in a timely manner and was not damaged in any way. If I had one complaint, it would be that the entire, (Back Included) was sealed so you could clean it in a sink. Not a big deal, just takes a bit more time to clean depending what you cut on it. I still love it and give it a glowing 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: cdub

customer_reviews.title: Cook's Helpers
customer_reviews.text: These boards surprised me with their weight; however that has proved to be a distinct advantage when cutting veggies or meat preparation for cooking. My wife fell in immediate love with the boards. I got a real nice "thank you" kiss. They are superlative at their intended purpose. If you cook get at least two.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great rolling pin!
customer_reviews.text: This rolling pin works great and looks even better! When not in use looks like modern art! More hygienic than wood. Nice weight means less effort in use. Should last a lifetime. Nice present 🎁. Looks expensive lol
customer_reviews.author: linda v

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but flawed
customer_reviews.text: The board I received had two superficial cracks that run the entire front and back. Very visible and concerning. I will not be using any temperatured items on this cause Im concerned the board will crack in half.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna20

customer_reviews.title: Uneven, wobbly, with residue
customer_reviews.text: The board is cut uneven. When placed on a hard surface it wobbles back and forth when pressured is applied when trying to use. Also came with some residue on the block. We can place something under one corner to keep it from wobbling, but it is something that is embarrassing when this item was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: One 3~4 inch corner area did not seem to get processed (maybe polished) properly and was dull compared to the rest of the top surface. I was a bit concerned the dough might stick to that area, but since it was at the corner I really did not roll out dough over that area. Mostly if detracts from the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfectfor its job
customer_reviews.text: Have had this marble stone rolling board for over 3 months and used it every weekend. It is serves its purpose perfectly sturdy and stable, cleans easily. It’s durable. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jumboFiatco

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Marble is beautiful in any setting. Heavy base. I'd have given a 5-star for sturdiness but for the fragile feel of the dome when first cleaned. I'm going to be as careful as possible with the dome but with or without, the marble is still beautiful and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Best for Indian chapati/tacos
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some sturdy base where I can make my dough and roll my chapatis/Indian tacos and this is perfect. I use it daily and it doesn't slip or shake.. it is very convenient. I am just worried that eventually the back side attachments might fall and then it loose the balance. But apart from that works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Harshi & Abi

customer_reviews.title: Color not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a black, this board is more grey and so is the paper towel holder. The board also had a small chip in it on a corner. We thought of returning them but due to the weight we decided to keep them. Not what we had hoped for but its workable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Roehl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect/updated
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to record playing with slime on! Sturdy and didn’t break at all during shipping! Secure feet that won’t slip at all! Perfect size! _______________ Update: worked well for a few weeks, I don’t use it for anything other than playing with slime on, yet it has noticible scratches on its surface ):
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: The stones are working great here for what I want but I have called ...
customer_reviews.text: The stones are working great here for what I want but I have called the factory twice and have not received an answer for any reply the tabs on the back the protective service that you put it on couple we’re missing wanted to get some more guess I’ll have to fix it myself
customer_reviews.author: Dennis V. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Lid cracked!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in Feb 2020 -- and glass lid has now cracked along the handle! No reason for the crack -- in fact it was empty when it just cracked, and the crack keeps growing across top of lid. I tried to contact seller, but received no response. What a shame because I really liked it. I wanted it for keeping rolls and muffins on counter top.
customer_reviews.author: nonofyourbusiness

customer_reviews.title: wrong  color description
customer_reviews.text: I like the piece.. but seller describes it as being WHITE... it is more like a black SPACKLED.... not what i needed on my counter.... since i am using it to protect counter top from hot items. I am elderly and find it to be a very big inconvenience to return!! Dr. maryellen
customer_reviews.author: Dr. maryellen

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for multiple purposes in the multi kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Multiple uses. The board size is a big plus for my kitchen. It is big enough and very convenient for multiple needs like cutting and chopping vegetables and fruit, bread rolling, pastry making, and can also be used as a cheese and cracker serving board. Does not leave prominent marks on the cutting surface. Issue is that it is heavy and you need to be careful lifting it if you need to carry it to the kitchen sink for thorough cleaning. And I wish the little anti-skid "feet" on the 4 corners were a little taller so that lifting the board off of the counter could be bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Love!! If it didn’t come broken...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gamble when ordering, great quality but came broken unfortunately. Surprisingly the glass dome wasn’t broke but the marble plate itself had chipped off and the piece was not even in the box so I couldn’t even attempt to glue it together.
customer_reviews.author: Sheyanne Rusher

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect. Very flat and polished smooth on one side
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these to use for sharpening bases for my sandpaper sharpening system. these are perfect. Very flat and polished smooth on one side. I'll split each one with two grits and it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Bad item
customer_reviews.text: Item doesn’t match picture. It’s a fake knockoff. This item is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: helen rozenberg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This board is solid and very heavy, I love it. It has 6 non slip 'feet' which I like. No shipping damage which is always a risk for something like this, it was packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect substitute to "chakla" for rotis!
customer_reviews.text: Took our roti-rolling experience to the next level! This is a perfect substitute to the traditional "chakla" when you are half-way across the globe from home. It's fairly hefty and, combined with the grippy pads at the bottom, remains very stable while rolling dough on it. Arrived perfectly intact with pristine finish. No chipping or any other defects as mentioned in a few of the other reviews. 5-star delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sudhamsu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pastry Board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of marble! Its great for tempering chocolate as it stays super cool. Love that its not too heavy or oversized and has good sized rubber feet below to keep the counters safe. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelangelo

customer_reviews.title: Received broken
customer_reviews.text: Would love it if it didn’t come broken... going to repurchase and hope it’s not
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutting/Serving Board
customer_reviews.text: First off, the cutting board is beautiful. I use it as a press board for my Espresso machine and it works like a charm. Very strong. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Real nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and attractive. I use it to display some China pieces. Goes perfectly with the tones. Packaged very well. It is a little heavy. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: BDS

customer_reviews.title: Seal it first!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value and I like the function, but I wish I would have known to seal before I used it. Somehow I dripped olive oil across the surface during the first use and despite the trick where you use cornstarch to remove the stain, the color is now super uneven and blotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester Alley

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a nice piece! She loves it, perfect size for counter top use. Rubber feet are a quality touch too. Even looks pretty sitting out leaning up on counter!
customer_reviews.author: Grp

customer_reviews.title: Very porous
customer_reviews.text: Item is very porous. Some water split on it and it had water spots. I dried it off and it went back to being its original state
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: EXQUISITE!  HEAVY, GORGEOUS, WELL-MADE, A BEAUTIFUL ADDITION TO MY KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous!! I use mine on top of my countertop convection oven, so I can put hot pans on it. when it's not in use, the beautiful black marble gleams and enhances my kitchen decor.
customer_reviews.author: Annie dusty

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful cake stand
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow! The cake stand is a beautiful, both the marble base and glass lid are heavy and well-made. I was impressed by the multiple layers of packing that was used to ensure it would not arrive broken or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the marble pastry board for an additional work space when making holiday cookies. Very elegant, sturdy, and heavy which is reflective of a good product. Had a slight issue and contacted the seller Grade-A-Global. Great customer service at this company and the staff I spoke to (Len) is AMAZING and handled the issue immediately. Could not ask for more. Very pleased overall!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chef

customer_reviews.title: cutting board
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot heavier than I thought it would be but it is the perfect size. Fortunately, the weight does not matter to me. I really like it and I would order it again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F. Wade

customer_reviews.title: My multi task piece if art work in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I love my marble board, I use it for many purposes in the kitchen. I use it as a chopping board which is easy to clean up afterwards. I use it as a serving board on my coffee table and for my cheeze and wine nights. Its the perfect size for my small space I have. Its a nice piece of marble for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Arroyave

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using it as a solid surface for tooling leather and hammering rivets/snaps/grommets and generally anything that needs a good beating. Works great for that, and it looks great too so that's pretty cool I guess. I'm not much for the pastry stuffs, but I bet this little guy could do the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pastry board
customer_reviews.text: Have this to my daughter, she loves baking. Used it the first day and was so very happy. Good size for cookies, do NOT move around, and no sticking. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia N

customer_reviews.title: Scratches Easy
customer_reviews.text: My husband used it as cutting board scratched thought it would be stronger didn't think it scratch so easy. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika M. Deyo

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got my pastry board tonight, & LOVE the weight, the look & the feel of this board! I can not wait to make pastries on it!
customer_reviews.author: Tara-Marie Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This slab is so pretty. Nice and heavy and brightens up my counter space and makes me feel fancy. It protects the laminate too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product-the reason why i don’t give it a 5 stars is because there were some small air balls in the top glass cover
customer_reviews.author: laet P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good rolling pin.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to use, very smooth finish. I might get rid of my other, more traditional style rolling pin in favor of this one. It's really nice. As a bonus you can use the little stand to pound garlic into a paste in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on the counter!! I’m very happy with the quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Taber

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the counter top and it’s the perfect size. Of course it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sudhakar Rajender

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my breadflour kneading and cutting. This is what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Miki Me

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when we got it. This was a gift I gave. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Libby Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great Item/Gift
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what I was missing. I love making pastries and this marble pastry board is just what I needed. Pastry didn’t stick and was easy to roll out. Just keep in mind it is marble so it can be heavy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second black granite pastry board I purchase and it won’t be the last. I have one on each side of my countertop. Comes in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST customer service and rolling pin, EVER. Period. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It arrived in one piece (I was reluctant about that due to some reviews I read.) It cleans up well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Neal C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful marble
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous piece of marble! 12" round, would love it more if it were a little larger- but truly beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray! It is very durable. I use it to rest my hookah on and when I put hot coals on it, it doesn’t burn through or leave marks. I highly recommend this tray! And it looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Lasker

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: The marble is pretty. The feet are holding the board well. The board was in perfect condition. Came early! It's not to heavy, it's shiny (well polished) and smooth. I'm 100% happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: scifiaddiction

customer_reviews.title: CHIPPED FROM THE START!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the product! I expected it to replace my bamboo cutting board, and be a tougher alternative to anything else out there. But, my board was chipped right out of the box! There was no damage to the box or to the styrofoam protecting the board inside the ox, so the boars was defective at the warehouse, someone saw the defect and packed it for shipment to a paying customer anyway! If you are going to buy this board, don't expect a gleaming, perfect granite board as I did.
customer_reviews.author: philandes williams

customer_reviews.title: Really heavy and excellent packing.  Good seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Havent used it yet. It will be good for my high butter dough.
customer_reviews.author: PHYLLIS G.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make the Indian roti and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Padmini Ekbote

customer_reviews.title: neat and a brilliant rolling pin
customer_reviews.text: great weight. looks just like the picture. very very easy to keep clean. i was looking for a good unbevelled pin and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz L

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive addition to the kitchen. We use it on either side of the sink as a hotpad, pastry board and catchall.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who is a great cook. This works great and great price! must have item!!
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you can.
customer_reviews.text: This is sand. It is glued together and not suitable for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! It will be a lifetime keeper if I take care of it. It is easy to scratch, so use a silicon scraper instead of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. I was happy to give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Glow77

customer_reviews.title: To know and understand maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I thought these couldn't get scratched, but my wife loves it. The porous bottom just requires extra care not to submerge into water when cleaning
customer_reviews.author: LEKENDRICK P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good and the way I expected. Very great finishing and the packing was awesome making sure the glass and the marble don’t get damaged. Fully recommend
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop it on your toe, It is Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful for serving or gifting and amazingly easy to clean. Extremely durable and did I mention it's heavy? Great product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES E SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pastry Board, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: The pastry board is beautiful. The first one I received had a scuff on it but the company sent out a new one right away and it was perfect. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen W.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this product. Budget friendly and looks super high end
customer_reviews.author: Candice M.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and beautiful. Purchased two of them for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and beautiful. Purchased two of them for my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Good product Was a unhappy with the finished edges as they where not smooth and it was all around smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.author: george a trama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Marble came in beautiful condition. I plan to use it to make candy. It will be absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: foughtpr

customer_reviews.title: Kota Japan Premium Non-Stick Natural Marble Pastry Board Slab 12" X 16" with No-Slip Rubber Feet
customer_reviews.text: I could have used a little larger one, but it would be too heavy, so this works okay. The name "Kota Japan" is misleading, it came with a "made in China" sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Is what it says, does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Brennok

customer_reviews.title: and the price was just fine. This particular board is going into my outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: The board came packaged extremely well, there wasn't a mark on it, and the price was just fine. This particular board is going into my outdoor kitchen and it's going to be great for that purpose, I can recommend it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Great basic piece for any kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Just what was needed in the kitchen. Easy cleanup and doesn't scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Gayl Hyde, ND, MS

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy. But, that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cutting board. Heavy, smooth, and looks very decorative. I'm happy with purchase and would recommend others buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: William Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Weight, thickness, durability are all great. I would have liked to see the edges more polished, but they aren't bad..... Overall. a good item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product ! Easy to clean, not very heavy, perfect to make rotis( Indian tortillas!)Looks exactly as advertised. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and heavy enough, just how I wanted it. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea T.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s a pastry board, I have used mine as a cutting board. I love it! The whole family is using it now also!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Dimensions Listef
customer_reviews.text: Not true 12” x 16” - half inch shy of both dims.
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: Will be using it as a cutting board. Beautiful addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as shown, really beautiful and sleek. Keeps dough cool which (with a pinch of flour) helps with sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love the non stick feature
customer_reviews.text: I love my new non stick natural marble pastry board. I used it to roll dough and I was pleasantly surprised on how thin I could roll without it getting stuck. It is a beautiful addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Manasi

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this board to work with Clay and I love it! I'm going to buy two more for food entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Daethaqt

customer_reviews.title: Classy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and the weight of the pin makes for a great way to get the job done when prepping to bake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible material
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board stained with every item that spilled on it. It left serrated edges every time you cut o it. Terrible product

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product all week to make hard tack candy .
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Burden

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a white marble rolling pin but look what I received, a black one. So disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It is heavy but as it should be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Great item, good value and fast service. Elegant trivet for my hot fudge machine.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product.i use it for a surface plate.in my machine shop.
customer_reviews.author: Deisel dan.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Loved it so much I ordered a second one
customer_reviews.author: VICKI L DESMOND

customer_reviews.title: PC Stand
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as a stand for my desktop computer case. It keeps the case cool from the carpet floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hahm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board, perfect size. I’m excited to try it out. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Item arrived timely
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Item arrived timely, in good condition with packaging, and it is a nice piece of stone. The smooth surface causes cleanup to go much more smoothly and healthier. Thank you for the quality product for sale on Amazon :)
customer_reviews.author: Snuggle Muffin

product_meta.title: Kota Japan Premium Non-Stick Natural Marble Pastry Board Slab 15 3/4" X 11 3/4” with No-Slip Rubber Feet for Stability and to Protect your Countertop | Easy to Clean | Stays Cool
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteEXPERIENCE AN ELEGENT WAY TO MAKE PASTRIES SERVE YOUR FAVORITE DELICACIES 

Our finely designed Natural Marble Pastry and Serving Board. A MUST Have in every home!!! 

FEATURES: 

Kota Japan specializes in homeware and kitchen accessories with a focus on innovative cooking and meal preparation. With an eye for both practical and pioneering products, Kota Japan aims to accommodate 21st century homeowners who desire solutions to make their home life easier and more enjoyable. 
With an already impressive array of kitchenware and home essentials, the Kota Japan line is continually expanding with new and exciting products being added each month. 
Kota Japan prides itself in offering home essentials of superior quality, assuring that all products have undergone extensive quality control and testing to ensure that each product meets our exacting standards. We are confident that each item is durable and a true testament to its form and function.
